tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I have visited Dr.Poojitha, Lotus Dental Hub, for root canal treatment.
Dr. Poojitha is a friendly and responsible Doctor and she will explain in detail regarding the problem. I felt very happy with the Treatment which was given by Dr Poojitha, Lotus Dental Hub.
The staff is good and professional. Thank you.

I will recommend this Doctor to my relatives and friends.
Thank you Dr. Poojitha for your patience and support.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: I am not satisfied with the filling...two time it came out third time they filled but i am not satisfied with the filling.
reply_text:
Hello sir/madam, 
We are extremely sorry for what has happened, as the filling is not stable for one among many teeth that are filled,  there might be various reasons for the same, we  tried our best to restore it thrice and hopefully your opinion might change once you come and visit the clinic to check what could be the reason.

Regards,
Lotus dental hub
